content: it took two instructions holding one strand of each yarn together cast on 104 112 stitches place marker and begin to work in the round edging materials round 1 knit row 2 *k4 p4 repeat from * to marker yarn repeat rounds 1 & 2 four more times 1 skein of kelbourne woolens scout 274 yards/100grams held with body 1 skein of louisa harding amitola round 1-7 knit 273 yards/50 grams needle us 8 16 or 24 long circular round 8 purl round 9 knit gauge and size round 10 purl round 11-17 knit 17st = 4 blocked round 18 purl medium 12 wide x13 high repeat body rounds 1 -18 2 1 times more large 13 25 wide x 12 25 high when laying flat size large only work body rounds 1-10 once more abbreviations both sizes k = knit knit 7 rounds p = purl edging round 1 knit row 2 *k4 p4 repeat from * to marker repeat rounds 1 & 2 four more times bind off weave in ends and block darnknitanyway com ©2024 darn knit anyway all rights reserved this is a free pattern stillwater mn 651-342-1386 we hope you make beautiful knit items for yourself or your loved ones
